to_address: "'Speakup is a screen review system for Linux.'" <speakup@braille.uwo.ca>
subject: RE: pci or usb synth
body:
Hi

Why not have a British voice for a change.   Software synthetic voices are seen as a more viable option.

Regards

Gena

Subject: Re: pci or usb synth


They have Espeak already in there. I'm not sure why it has a British accent 
to it though. It's a lot better than Festival.
